## ResourceStore.hooks property

**Signature:**

```typescript
hooks: {
        onNewItem?: (opt: PatchOptions<G, P>) => Promise<void>;
        onBeforeDelete?: (opt: {
            fid: number;
        }) => Promise<void>;
        onBeforePatch?: (data: Partial<FeatureItem<P, Geometry>>[], opt: {
            id: number;
        }) => Promise<void>;
        delete?: (resourceId: number, featureId: number) => Promise<void>;
    };
```
